tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_collection_schedule ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    route_id INT, 
    collection_date DATE, 
    truck_id INT, 
    driver_id INT 
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collection_time TIME,
  driver_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE collection_route (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  total_distance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ResourceAllocation (
  allocation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id UUID NOT NULL,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  driver_id UUID NOT NULL,
  allocated_resource TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name TEXT,
    driver_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    collection_points JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_schedules (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	collection_day VARCHAR(50),
	collection_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_routes (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	route_name VARCHAR(100),
	start_location VARCHAR(255),
	end_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_vehicles (
	vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
	max_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_teams (
	team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_name VARCHAR(100),
	driver_name VARCHAR(100),
	vehicle_assigned INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	collection_date DATE,
	team_id INT,
	route_id INT
)
